mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily_boxoffice( boxofficeType, showRange, rnum, `rank`, rankOldAndNew, movieCd, movieNm, openDt, salesAmt, salesShare, salesAcc, audiCnt, audiAcc, scrnCnt, showCnt) VALUES( #{boxofficeType}, #{showRange}, #{rnum}, #{rank}, #{rankOldAndNew}, #{movieCd}, #{movieNm}, #{openDt}, #{salesAmt}, #{salesShare},#{salesAcc}, #{audiCnt}, #{audiAcc},#{scrnCnt}, #{showCnt})
